title.rendered: Hot Springs near Buena Vista, Colorado

content.rendered:
Feel the cool mountain breeze, as your hard work pays off with a soak in a natural hot spring. What could be better than rewarding yourself after “playing” all day in the rockies, with this soul soothing experience sure to make your body energized for the next days activity. So, enjoy these great hot springs near Buena Vista and your chance to reinvigorate yourself!

Cottonwood Hot Springs Inn and Spa
This remodeled mountain gem is snuggled along the majestic Collegiate Peaks Range. This old west style country inn has a hotel, cabins, and campsites right on the wonderful property. The creekside cabins are most popular and relaxing. Now, the good part, where you soak your soul in our natural hot springs, and enjoy our healing waters! So be ready to enjoy all Cottonwood Hot Springs has to offer! Enjoy your soak and stay!


Antero Hot Springs
Antero hot springs is just a cool 10 minutes from Breckenridge, Co, take this short drive to enjoy an unforgettable hot spring experience. Situated in the San Isabel National Forest in the heart of fourteener country of Colorado. This unique location runs along Chalk Creek, which, makes the cabins feel remote and comfortable. Each cabin has it’s own hot spring right outside the door. With 1,500 ft. cliffs surrounding the property, this incredible spot has a feel of its own. A natural wetland, rushing creek and (sure to see) wildlife make it even more exciting and a place to enjoy a true colorado experience.


Mt. Princeton Hot Springs
Check out this majestic mountain resort! Mt. Princeton is an ideal location for weddings, conferences or just a good ol fashioned western fun. Cabins, spa and lodges accompany this resort, along with spa treatment if necessary. The hot springs themselves include a kid (and adult!) friendly slide, amongst the soothing pools. Dont forget to finish a great day of fun, with dinner at the Princeton Club, and a mind relaxing adult beverage to top it all off!

In all, what could go wrong at these once in a lifetime mountain gems. Take it all in and make all your hiking, biking, rafting, and zipping activities with AVA Rafting all worth it.
